parameters.subject: Please review the content created by SEO Automation
parameters.message:
=Hi ,

We‚Äôve generated new content drafts through our WordPress SEO automation workflow, designed to improve organic visibility and engagement for your website. You can review the drafts using the link below: üëâ  {{ $json.body.rowValues[0]['5'] }}

Please take a few minutes to review and share any edits, feedback, or approvals directly in the document comments. Once approved, we‚Äôll schedule the content for publishing. Thank you for your time and collaboration ‚Äî your insights ensure the content stays aligned with your brand voice and goals. 

Best regards, 
Rehan Azeem 
Fourth Wave Digital Marketing

parameters.text:
=Y SEO RESEARCH & WORDPRESS PAGE GENERATION AGENT

MISSION: Analyze the provided website link and create comprehensive, SEO-optimized WordPress pages based on thorough competitive research and industry best practices.

WEBSITE TO ANALYZE:  {{ $json.body.rowValues[0]["2"] }}
RESEARCH PHASE INSTRUCTIONS:
1. COMPETITOR ANALYSIS
   - Identify top 10 competitors in the same industry/niche
   - Analyze their page structures, content strategies, and SEO approaches
   - Extract high-performing keywords they're ranking for
   - Study their content depth, formatting, and user engagement elements

2. KEYWORD RESEARCH
   - Primary keywords (high volume, medium competition)
   - Long-tail keywords (specific, conversion-focused)
   - Local SEO keywords (if applicable)
   - Semantic keywords and LSI terms
   - Question-based keywords for FAQ sections

3. INDUSTRY ANALYSIS
   - Current market trends and pain points
   - Target audience demographics and behavior
   - Common objections and concerns
   - Seasonal trends and opportunities
   - Regulatory or compliance considerations

PAGE GENERATION REQUIREMENTS:

**LANDING PAGE STRUCTURE:**
- Compelling headline with primary keyword
- Subheadline addressing main value proposition
- Hero section with clear CTA
- Benefits/features section (3-5 key points)
- Social proof (testimonials placeholder)
- FAQ section (5-7 common questions)
- Secondary CTA section
- Trust signals and certifications
- Meta title (55-60 characters)
- Meta description (150-160 characters)
- Schema markup recommendations

**SERVICE PAGE STRUCTURE:**
- Service-focused H1 with target keyword
- Service overview and benefits
- Detailed process/methodology (step-by-step)
- Pricing structure or packages
- Case studies/portfolio section placeholder
- Related services cross-links
- Local service area coverage (if applicable)
- Conversion-focused CTAs throughout
- Technical specifications or requirements
- Guarantee/warranty information
- Meta title optimized for service + location
- Meta description highlighting unique value

**BLOG PAGE STRUCTURE:**
- SEO-optimized title (60 characters max)
- Engaging introduction with hook
- Comprehensive outline with H2/H3 structure
- 1500-2500 word count target
- Internal linking opportunities (5-8 links)
- External authority links (2-3 relevant sources)
- Image/media placement suggestions
- Call-to-action integration
- Related posts section
- Author bio section
- Social sharing optimization
- Featured snippet optimization
- Meta description for click-through

**LOCATION PAGE STRUCTURE:**
- Location-specific H1 with geo-keywords
- Local business information (NAP consistency)
- Service area coverage map placeholder
- Local testimonials and reviews section
- Community involvement/local partnerships
- Location-specific offers or promotions
- Driving directions and parking info
- Local landmarks and accessibility
- Hours of operation
- Local schema markup requirements
- Google My Business optimization tips
- Local citation opportunities

CONTENT QUALITY STANDARDS:
- E-A-T compliance (Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trustworthiness)
- User-first content approach
- Mobile-responsive design considerations
- Page speed optimization recommendations
- Accessibility compliance (WCAG guidelines)
- Conversion rate optimization elements
- A/B testing suggestions for key elements

SEO TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Title tag optimization (primary keyword placement)
- Meta descriptions with compelling CTAs
- Header tag hierarchy (H1, H2, H3 structure)
- Image alt text recommendations
- Internal linking strategy
- URL structure suggestions
- Breadcrumb navigation
- Site speed optimization tips
- Mobile-first indexing compliance
- Core Web Vitals considerations

CONTENT TONE & STYLE:
- Professional yet approachable
- Industry-appropriate terminology
- Clear, scannable formatting
- Action-oriented language
- Trust-building elements
- Problem-solution focused
- Benefit-driven messaging
- Local community connection (for location pages)

DELIVERABLE FORMAT:
For each page type, provide:
1. Complete HTML/WordPress content structure
2. SEO metadata (title, description, keywords)
3. Keyword density recommendations
4. Internal linking suggestions
5. Image/media placement guide
6. CTA placement and copy
7. Schema markup code
8. Performance optimization checklist
9. Competitive advantage points
10. Conversion optimization recommendations

RESEARCH DEPTH REQUIREMENTS:
- Minimum 20 competitor pages analyzed per page type
- 50+ relevant keywords identified per page
- Industry trend analysis (last 12 months)
- User intent mapping for each keyword
- Content gap analysis vs competitors
- Local search optimization opportunities
- Voice search optimization considerations
- Featured snippet optimization strategies

OUTPUT SPECIFICATIONS:
- WordPress-ready HTML structure
- Yoast SEO plugin optimization
- Elementor/Gutenberg block suggestions
- Mobile responsiveness notes
- Loading speed recommendations
- User experience enhancement tips
- Conversion tracking setup guide
- Analytics goal configuration

QUALITY ASSURANCE CHECKLIST:
‚ñ° All content is original and plagiarism-free
‚ñ° Keywords naturally integrated (2-3% density)
‚ñ° Readability score 60+ (Flesch Reading Ease)
‚ñ° All CTAs are clear and compelling
‚ñ° Mobile-first design principles applied
‚ñ° Local SEO elements included where relevant
‚ñ° Technical SEO requirements met
‚ñ° User experience optimized
‚ñ° Conversion funnel considered
‚ñ° Brand voice consistency maintained

Begin comprehensive research and generation process for all four page types based on the provided website link analysis.

=You are an SEO writer creating a **local service/location page** in plain text (no HTML).

--------------------------------------------------------------
## INPUTS
Research:
{{ $json.output }}

Keywords:
{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.rowValues[0]['1'] }}

Only use the company name if it exists in the research; otherwise, write it generically.

--------------------------------------------------------------
## OBJECTIVE
Write a 900‚Äì1200-word **location page** that:
- Highlights AI consulting or automation expertise for local clients
- References location-specific insights found in the research
- Naturally uses the provided keywords
- Ends with a compelling call-to-action

--------------------------------------------------------------
## STRUCTURE
H1: Service or Industry Focus + Location
Intro: Discuss the importance of the service in this region

H2: About Our Expertise in This Area
- Reference data or credibility indicators from research

H2: Local Services and Solutions
- Detail specific offerings mentioned in research
- Use keywords naturally

H2: Why Businesses in This Location Choose Us
- Use evidence or testimonials if available in research

Conclusion / CTA:
- Encourage the reader to inquire or learn more

--------------------------------------------------------------
## STYLE
- Plain text output only
- Localized and personable tone
- Use Canadian English
- Maintain natural keyword integration
--------------------------------------------------------------

Now, write the complete **location page content** based solely on the research and keywords above.


--------------------------------------------------------------
## OUTPUT FORMAT

Return your response in this exact JSON structure:

```json
{
  "output": "Complete landing page content with all sections formatted as plain text here",
  "title": "SEO-optimized Google Docs title (50-60 characters)"
}
```

Now, write the full-length **landing page content** based only on the research and keywords above, formatted in the simple JSON structure specified.

=You are an expert SEO copywriter for AI consulting and automation brands. Based on the research provided below, create a complete, persuasive, and SEO-optimized **landing page**.

--------------------------------------------------------------
## INSTRUCTIONS

Use the research insights from:
{{ $json.output }}

Incorporate the following SEO keywords naturally:
{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.rowValues[0]['1'] }}

Do NOT add or assume any company name ‚Äî use the one from the research if available. If none appears, write the content generically as "our team" or "our company."

--------------------------------------------------------------
## CONTENT OBJECTIVE
Write a 900‚Äì1500-word **landing page** that:
1. Attracts and converts readers into leads
2. Reflects authority and trust in AI automation
3. Highlights clear benefits, process, and differentiation
4. Ends with a compelling call-to-action (CTA)

--------------------------------------------------------------
## STRUCTURE
H1: Core Offer or Promise (use topic from research)
Intro: Describe key problem and how the solution helps

H2: Benefits of Our Solution
- Focus on measurable results and value
- Integrate research-backed statements

H2: How It Works
- Explain workflow, process, or framework (3‚Äì5 steps)

H2: Why Choose Us
- Use data, testimonials, or credibility markers from the research

Conclusion / CTA:
- End with an action-inviting close (e.g., "Get started today")

--------------------------------------------------------------
## STYLE
- Plain text output only (no HTML)
- Canadian English spelling
- Tone: authoritative, persuasive, and professional
- Naturally blend SEO keywords from the provided list

--------------------------------------------------------------
## OUTPUT FORMAT

Return your response in this exact JSON structure:

```json
{
  "output": "Complete landing page content with all sections formatted as plain text here",
  "title": "SEO-optimized Google Docs title (50-60 characters)"
}
```

Now, write the full-length **landing page content** based only on the research and keywords above, formatted in the simple JSON structure specified.

=You are an SEO content specialist writing a full-length **service page** in plain text (no HTML).

--------------------------------------------------------------
## INPUT DATA
Research:
{{ $json.output }}

Keywords:
{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.rowValues[0]['1'] }}

Use the information which exists in the research; otherwise, write generically.

--------------------------------------------------------------
## OBJECTIVE
Write a 1000‚Äì1500-word **service page** that:
- Clearly defines and explains the service described in the research
- Highlights key benefits, process, and differentiation
- Incorporates the given keywords naturally
- Concludes with a clear, persuasive CTA

--------------------------------------------------------------
## STRUCTURE
H1: Service Name or Focus (from research)
Intro: Explain the service and its relevance

H2: What This Service Is
- Define the service and its context within AI/automation

H2: Key Benefits
- Outline main advantages using insights from the research

H2: Our Process
- Describe how the service is delivered (step-by-step)

H2: Why Businesses Trust This Service
- Use stats, quotes, or findings from the research

Conclusion / CTA:
- Encourage readers to take the next step or inquire

--------------------------------------------------------------
## STYLE
- Plain text only
- Professional, clear, and value-driven tone
- Use Canadian English
- Keywords should appear naturally throughout
--------------------------------------------------------------

Now, write the complete **service page content** using the research and keywords provided.

--------------------------------------------------------------
## OUTPUT FORMAT

Return your response in this exact JSON structure:

```json
{
  "output": "Complete landing page content with all sections formatted as plain text here",
  "title": "SEO-optimized Google Docs title (50-60 characters)"
}
```

Now, write the full-length **landing page content** based only on the research and keywords above, formatted in the simple JSON structure specified.

=You are a professional content writer creating a **long-form, SEO-optimized blog post** (no HTML output).

--------------------------------------------------------------
## INPUTS
Research:
{{ $json.output }}

Keywords:
{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.rowValues[0]['1'] }}

If a company name appears in the research, use it. Otherwise, write from a neutral, expert-authority perspective (no brand insertion).

--------------------------------------------------------------
## OBJECTIVE
Write a 1500‚Äì2000-word blog post that:
- Uses insights and quotes from the research naturally
- Incorporates SEO keywords effectively
- Educates and engages business leaders or operations managers
- Ends with a strong concluding takeaway

--------------------------------------------------------------
## STRUCTURE
H1: Main Blog Title (based on research topic)
Intro: Context and importance of the topic

H2: Understanding the Core Concept
- Reference main theme from research

H2: Key Insights from Research
- Include specific findings or data
- Attribute sources naturally (e.g., ‚ÄúAccording to‚Ä¶‚Äù)

H2: Real-World Applications
- Explain practical uses or case examples

H2: Challenges and Solutions
- Discuss industry challenges and how to overcome them

H2: Future Outlook or Expert Advice
- Mention what trends or innovations may follow

Conclusion:
- Summarize main points and close with a motivational or action-based thought

--------------------------------------------------------------
## STYLE
- Plain text output only
- Conversational yet authoritative
- Use Canadian English
- Avoid keyword stuffing; prioritize readability
--------------------------------------------------------------

Now, write the full **blog post** based on the research and keywords above.


--------------------------------------------------------------
## OUTPUT FORMAT

Return your response in this exact JSON structure:

```json
{
  "output": "Complete landing page content with all sections formatted as plain text here",
  "title": "SEO-optimized Google Docs title (50-60 characters)"
}
```

Now, write the full-length **landing page content** based only on the research and keywords above, formatted in the simple JSON structure specified.

Auto-link any fully qualified URLs present in the content using ‚Ä¶. Paragraphs & spacing For standalone text blocks that are not headings or list items, wrap as

. Collapse excessive blank lines. No
unless a deliberate single line break is present within the same paragraph. HTML structure Wrap the entire output in:
‚Ä¶converted HTML‚Ä¶
Do not include , , or tags. Do not add CSS, scripts, or JSON-LD unless present in the input. Safety & fidelity Do not invent company names, stats, links, or testimonials. Do not add new sections beyond what exists in the input. Output only the final HTML‚Äîno explanations. Now convert the following text to HTML: {{ $json.content }}

parameters.content:
## Content Generation (Research ‚Üí Draft ‚Üí Google Doc)

### What it does
When you pick a page type in the sheet, this workflow researches the target website, generates SEO-optimized copy (landing/service/blog/location), and saves it to Google Docs. It also writes the doc link back to the sheet.

### How it‚Äôs triggered (Sheet dropdowns)
- **Type of page** (Landing Page / Service Page / Blog / Location Page) ‚Üí tells the workflow which copy template to use.
- **Keywords + Website URL** cells provide context for research and writing.

### Key steps
1. **Webhook** receives the row edit from the ‚ÄúNew Website content‚Äù sheet.  
2. **Filter** ensures we only act on the correct sheet/column change (the ‚ÄúType of page‚Äù column).  
3. **AI Agent (Researcher)** analyzes the provided site URL and compiles competitor/keyword/industry insights.  
4. **Switch (Page Type)** routes to the right copywriter:
   - Copywriter for Landing Page  
   - Copywriter for Service Page  
   - Copywriter for Blog  
   - Copywriter for Location Page  
5. **Copywriter Node** produces plain-text content and a suggested SEO title in a strict JSON structure.  
6. **Cleaning Code** strips code fences and parses JSON to title + content.  
7. **Google Docs ‚Äì Create/Update** builds a fresh Doc with the generated content.  
8. **Code (Doc Link Builder)** converts the Doc ID into a shareable edit URL.  
9. **Google Sheets ‚Äì Append/Update** writes the new Doc link back to the same row (using ID to match).

### Outputs
- A Google Doc per page with the generated draft.  
- The Doc URL saved to the sheet in the doc link column.

### Notes/Customization
- Content style uses **Canadian English**, **SEO structure**, and **clear CTAs**.  
- You can adjust the research depth, word counts, and tone inside each copywriter prompt.  
- Matching is done by the **ID column** to avoid duplicating rows.
